snippet: Jack White has released a video to the song "Sixteen Saltines." I'm sure it will inspire endless debate - too disturbing? exploitative? - but I have only one question. Is Jack White a fan of the 1979 film "Over the Edge"?
abstract: Jack White has released a video to the song "Sixteen Saltines." I'm sure it will inspire endless debate - too disturbing? exploitative? - but I have only one question. Is Jack White a fan of the 1979 film "Over the Edge"?
